name: Crossword Solver
body:
### About Crossword Solver
This is a simple crossword solving application written in C#. It was written to help solve complex crossword puzzles and supports many different languages, including English, Spanish, Italian, and more.

### Features
-Reads input from a text document, with rows of letters separated by new lines
-Takes words to look for from an array
-Shows solutions to words by highlighting them

### To-Do
-Optical character recognition, fills character array by taking a picture of the crossword puzzle
-User-friendly GUI
-Easy way to input words to look for
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
